               </picture>
              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-photography " id="post-689957">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/june-2015-national-geographic-traveler-photo-contest/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" alt="June 2015 National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/natgeojune2-440x285.jpg" alt="June 2015 National Geographic Traveler Photo Contest"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-690617">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/a-suspended-bonsai-inside-an-abandoned-power-plant/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">

              </a>

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-694046">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/aaron-onassis/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/onassis-1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/onassis-1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-motion loop-video " id="post-674266">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-motion" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/30/sport-photography-by-adam-pretty/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/AdamPretty1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/AdamPretty1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology " id="post-669351">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/20/conceptual-poster-design/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Conceptual-Poster-Design-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Conceptual-Poster-Design-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">

             </article>

            </li>

      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </li>

                </picture>
                <div class="container-icon-video">

               <div class="container-text-loop">

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/13/google-logo-turned-into-functional-search-bar-2/">

                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-13T12:25:17+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 19 heures
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">

                  <img alt="Google Logo Turned into Functional Search Bar" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/searchbar-11-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-527111">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/04/13/best-of-creative-chairs-on-fubiz/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                   Batman in Wood
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-11T15:45:12+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 3 jours
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">
                    
                   </span>
                  </span>
                  <span class="number-share">
                   <span class="icon-share">
                   </span>
                   76
                  </span>
                 </small>
                </div>
               </div>
              </article>
              <!-- .post -->
             </li>

               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">
                   Technology
                  </a>

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

     <div class="container-header-single">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 col-xs-12">
         <h1 class="title-part white-title">
          iPhone Ocarina
         </h1>
         <div class="info-article">
          <div class="container-info-article">
           <p class="post-categories">
            <a class="waves-effect" href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="background-color: rgba(128,140,209, 0.85); border-color: rgb(128,140,209);">
             Technology
            </a>
           </p>
           <span class="time">
            <time datetime="2008-11-10T19:10:31+02:00" pubdate="">
             Il y a 7 ans
            </time>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="single-page" id="single-container" style="border-top-color: rgb(128,140,209);">
     <div class="shadow-box hidden-sm hidden-xs">
     </div>
     <div class="container container-custom" id="content">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-lg-9 col-md-8 col-sm-12 col-xs-12 content-single-xs">
        <div class="main-container-single">
         <div class="container-element-scroll-single">
          <div class="left-content-single">
           <div class="share-block">
            <div class="count-total">
             <span class="number clrz_compteur">
              11
             </span>
             <span class="txt visible-lg">
              shares
             </span>
            </div>
            <div class="share-social">
             <div class="facebook-share share-square">
              <div class="share-button">
               <a class="share-popin js-btn-countshare" data-id="12616" href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fubiz.net%2F2008%2F11%2F10%2Fiphone-ocarina%2F" target="_blank">
                <span class="icon-facebook icon-social">
                </span>
                <span class="count-each">
                 11
                </span>
               </a>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="twitter-share share-square">
              <div class="share-button">
               <a class="share-popin js-btn-countshare" data-id="12616" href="https://twitter.com/share?text=iPhone+Ocarina&amp;url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fubiz.net%2F2008%2F11%2F10%2Fiphone-ocarina%2F" target="_blank">
                <span class="icon-twitter icon-social">
                </span>
                <span class="count-each">
                 0
                </span>
               </a>
              </div>
             </div>
             <div class="bookmark-share share-square visible-xs clrz_likez" rel="12616">
              <span class="icon-bookmark">
              </span>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="content-single color-technology">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-12616">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               Une nouvelle application musicale pour liPhone : le concept de lOcarina exploitant les fonctions sensitives et lcran tactile. Il suffit de souffler sur le capteur du micro de lappareil pour faire de la musique. Explications dans la suite.
              </p>
              <p>
               <img alt="" class="lazy " data-original="http://data.fubiz.net/images/ocarina.jpg" src=""/>
              </p>
              <noscript>
               <img alt="" src="http://data.fubiz.net/images/ocarina.jpg"/>
              </noscript>
              <p>
               <span id="more-12616">
               </span>
               <br/>
               <object height="367" width="639">
                <param name="allowfullscreen" value="true">
                </param>
                <param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always">
                </param>
                <param name="movie" value="http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=2131612&amp;server=vimeo.com&amp;show_title=0&amp;show_byline=0&amp;show_portrait=0&amp;color=00ADEF&amp;fullscreen=1">
                </param>
                <embed allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" height="367" src="http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=2131612&amp;server=vimeo.com&amp;show_title=0&amp;show_byline=0&amp;show_portrait=0&amp;color=00ADEF&amp;fullscreen=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="550">
                </embed>
               </object>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=293053479&amp;mt=8" hreflang="fr">
                Disponible
               </a>
               au prix de 0,79  sur lAppStore.
              </p>
             </div>
            </div>
           </article>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="post-full-info">
          <div class="left-content">
           <a class="post-avatar" href="/member/Fubiz/" style="background-image:url(http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Romain1-200x200.jpg);">
           </a>
           <p class="writtenby">
            Written by
           </p>
           <br/>
           <a class="post-author" href="/member/Fubiz/">
            Romain
           </a>
           <br/>
           <p class="function-author">
            Founder &amp; Creative Director
           </p>
          </div>

                 jQuery(document).ready(function(e) {
                        
var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-300x600" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+

    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/300x600/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+

    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}
                        jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-side-1').attr('id', 'div-gpt-ad-side-1-old');
                    });

                 <h4 class="title-article">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/22/watercolor-portraits-of-hollywood-actresses/">
                   Watercolor Portraits of Hollywood Actresses
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-06-22T18:00:06+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 3 semaines
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">

var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }

               <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology " id="post-693989">
                <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/14/ceramic-hill-installation-in-london/">
                 <picture class="img-responsive first">

                  </source>

                  <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

              </a>
              <div class="container-text-loop">
               <div>
                <span class="post-categories">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/graphic/" style="color:rgb(177,202,100);">
                  Graphic
                 </a>
                </span>
                <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                 <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/14/bicycle-device-showing-illuminated-signals-on-cyclists-back-2/">
                  Bicycle Device Showing Illuminated Signals On...
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <small class="post-info">
                 <span class="post-about">

                  </time>

               </picture>

  <script>
   fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
  </script>

  if (d.getElementById(id)) return;
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/fr_FR/all.js#xfbml=1";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
}(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
